org.jooby.apitool

Class ApiParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jooby.apitool.ApiParser

  • public class ApiParser
extends Object
    Parse and extract route metadata from bytecode and documentation from source code.
    Since:
    1.2.0
    Author:
    edgar

      • export

        public Path export(Path outputBaseDir,
                   String application)
            throws Exception
        Parse application bytecode, build route methods from it and export all metadata to .json.
        Parameters:
        outputBaseDir - Output base directory. This method appends the java package of the given application.
        application - Application to parse.
        Returns:
        List of route methods.
        Throws:
        Exception - If something goes wrong.

      • parseFully

        public List<RouteMethod> parseFully(String application,
                                    List<Route.Definition> routes)
                             throws Exception
        Parse application bytecode, build route methods from it and merge output with the given routes.
        Parameters:
        application - Application to parse.
        routes - Application routes.
        Returns:
        List of route methods.
        Throws:
        Exception - If something goes wrong.

      • modify

        public ApiParser modify(Predicate<RouteMethod> matcher,
                        Consumer<RouteMethod> customizer)
        Modify one or more route method who matches the filter. Work as a API to fix possible missing metadata.
        Parameters:
        matcher - Route matcher.
        customizer - Customizer.
        Returns:
        This parser.
